job.title: Lead Data Scientist
job.description: Seeking a Lead Data Scientist to lead a team of Data Scientists building new machine learning models which will help users achieve their health goalsbrbrWhat You Will Be DoingbrbrCollaborate with product teams to deliver solutions that enhance the customer experience and improve the efficiency of user acquisitionbrbrFollow Agile methodology process to get tasks donebrbrProvide guidance to Data Scientists and ensure proper use of standard methodologiesbrbrWork with research and clinical teams to define the data requirements and the data collection protocols and ensure quality of the data being collectedbrbrBuild and expand array of machine learning models using NLP regression classification neural networksbrbrResponsible for the performance of data science products with a keen understanding of the levers to provide increased valuebrbrDevelop advanced algorithms that solve problems of large dimensionality in a computationally efficient and statistically effective mannerbrbrDrive RampD on new models and evaluate business opportunitiesbrbrEstablish roadmap to improve the scalability of data pipelines and modeling infrastructurebrbrWhat You Need for this PositionbrbrMasters Degree in Data Science Statistics or a related field PhD desiredbrbr8 years of experience in the field of data science or machine learningbrbrProficient with code versioning tools such as GitbrbrStrong technical background and experience working with scalable data systems SparkbrbrProficient with SQL and data mining experience with Matlab Python R Scala or other Big Data toolsbrbrStrong understanding of machine learning algorithms and statistical methodsbrbrAgile methodology and working with Scrum TeamsbrbrLeveraging relational databases manipulating data structures and analyzing complex data setsbrbrHandsOn building and optimizing data pipelines developing data models and designing schemasbrbrStrong analytic skills related to working with unstructured datasetsbrbrProficient with code versioning tools such as GitbrbrExperience organizing and analyzing data collection from various sourcesbrbrGood communication skills both verbal and written and the ability to interface effectively with engineering and manufacturing personnelbrbrKnowledge of diabetes is a BIG PLUSbrbrFor your hard work and dedication earn a generous salary plus bonus and stock options along with a comprehensive benefits package including 401k and moreplus join a organization who promotes within to build your career pathbrbrPossible relocation assistance for an ideal candidatebrbrstronguEmail Your Resume In Word TobrbrustrongLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you Clicking apply is the best way to
